page.title: 15KIRKCOWAN GOES TO FESTIVALS
page.content: Every March a {Dancing Festival}is held in Newton Stewart.For weeks we practised a{Scottish}dance and a{ {Swedish}dance ready for the competition.When we finished we waited nervously for the judge to tell us if we had won the cup.Dancers from many schools,dressed in national costumes competed. Once a year schools from the whole of Wigtownshire enter the{Music Festival} which is held in Newton Stewart and Stranraer.This lasts for one week and competitions are held for choral singing,instrument playing,string groups,action songs and singing games. An{adjudicator}judges each performance and awards {certificates.}Pupils from our school entered a choir, action song,violin solos and duets,cello solo,accordion solo,string group, recorder group and recorder solos.
